Name: Lee
Info: He came here alone. Though without other special abilities, his bullets will never miss Kuroro and secret treasures.

Name: Chrome
Info: His energy is powerful enough to freeze the running water, turning traps into a road to the treasure.

Name: Liv
Info: When the healer arrives, she summons the fire to melt the snow and burn down the grass in her way to help her get the treasure faster.
SkillTypeDescs: ['Describe the first stat', 'Describe the second stat']

Name: Vera
Info: Lightning is a tool for good assassins. It can help the grass and trees to grow and stop the assassin at the right time so key clues won't be missed.
SkillTypeDescs: ['Describe the first stat', 'Describe the second stat']

Name: Selena
Info: A performer attracted to the stage. Her music seems to resonate with the mist, transporting her to another location.
SkillTypeDescs: ['Describe the first stat', 'Describe the second stat']

Name: Selena's Shadow
Info: A performer attracted to the stage. Her music seems to resonate with the mist, transporting her to another location.
SkillTypeDescs: ['Describe the first stat', 'Describe the second stat']

Name: Liv
Info: Gentle but not fragile, the healer has come here alone. No puzzles can stop her.

Name: Lee
Info: When the killer arrives, he also summons fire that can burn down any grass. Nothing can stand in his way.

Name: Hanying
Info: Summoned to this place by a mysterious force. Her gentle actions can even push the swaying bubbles to form an easy path toward the end point.

Name: Ayla
Info: Unlike her passionate personality, the painter's brush is cautious, calm and precise. It can freeze running water and turn traps into clear paths.

Name: Lucia
Info: Her lightning blade can resonate with metal mechanism and allow her to stay in special positions.

Name: Liv's Shadow
Info: The shadow of the gentle healer. Although she has no special abilities, her presence can at least make you feel less lonely.

Name: Lee's Shadow
Info: With lightning power, this shadow can make grass grow so the killer can stop by and not miss key clues.

Name: Hanying's Shadow
Info: The dancer's shadow has a completely opposite temperament. Her fierce movements can easily pop illusory bubbles. All obstacles seem futile before her.

Name: Ayla's Shadow
Info: This shadow seems to reflect the true nature of the painter and has the power to melt ice and snow. Still, you must beware, for flowing water can also be dangerous.

Name: Lucia's Shadow
Info: This shadow is like a black hole. When she passes by, all metal will be torn apart and absorbed.

Name: Veronica
Info: Physical Form Veronica, with immense strength, can knock away certain units in her path.
SkillTypeDescs: ['Physical Form Veronica, with immense strength, can knock away certain units in her path.']

Name: Veronica
Info: Fire Form Veronica, protected by flames, can ignite certain units upon contact.
